argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | opsrso.o | |- O = ( ( I ordPwSer R ) ` T ) |
| 2 |  | opsrso.i | |- ( ph -> I e. V ) |
| 3 |  | opsrso.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Toset ) |
| 4 |  | opsrso.t | |- ( ph -> T C_ ( I X. I ) ) |
| 5 |  | opsrso.w | |- ( ph -> T We I ) |
| 6 |  | opsrso.l | |- .<_ = ( lt ` O ) |
| 7 |  | opsrso.b | |- B = ( Base ` O ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_opsrtos | |- ( ph -> O e. Toset ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( le ` O ) = ( le ` O ) |
| 10 | 7, 9, 6 | #P_tosso | |- ( O e. Toset -> ( O e. Toset <-> ( .<_ Or B /\ ( _I |` B ) C_ ( le ` O ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ibi | |- ( O e. Toset -> ( .<_ Or B /\ ( _I |` B ) C_ ( le ` O ) ) ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( .<_ Or B /\ ( _I |` B ) C_ ( le ` O ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_simpld | |- ( ph -> .<_ Or B ) |
